NewsArticle.Title: Balance Hosted Arena - Beta
NewsArticle.Content:
Today we are releasing the first Balance Hosted Arena. Please keep in mind that this will be a "beta" release.
**Light Necklace and Lumen Amulet are prohibited in both Balanced Arenas
Updates:
Balanced Arena as well as Balance Hosted Arena will give the following stats to participating players.
HP 250K MP 150K
Error & DA Team
